title: flourishy, vintage design style
content:
I am looking to find a designer that can design with a style similar to as in this image. Elegant with flourish, vintage, etc. The design work would be for invitations and a logo.

I am having trouble finding examples of this type of work and designers that design this way. Can anyone help me to understand that design/typography style this is considered? Also, what are some good resources online for finding examples of this style and designers who can do this.

Thanks.

Joshua

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052938im_/http:/typophile.com/files/image_5133.jpg)
author: jjdewtt

comments.content:
Get this book:  
 [Type. A Visual History of Typefaces & Graphic Styles](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052938/http:/ilovetypography.com/2009/11/06/type-a-visual-history-of-typefaces-graphic-styles/)

That book is good, I would also check out "New Vintage Type" I think youll find a little more of what you are looking for.

Some design firms to check out who do this type of work:

[www.ptarmak.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052938/http:/www.ptarmak.com/ "www.ptarmak.com")  
 [www.gardnerdesign.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052938/http:/www.gardnerdesign.com/ "www.gardnerdesign.com")  
 [www.muccadesign.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052938/http:/www.muccadesign.com/ "www.muccadesign.com")  
 [www.louisefili.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052938/http:/www.louisefili.com/ "www.louisefili.com")

If you are looking for someone more on a freelance basis to do a specific project for you, I know a few designers who have a knack for this, let me know if that is the case. Just know that type of design can be incredibly time consuming and not cheap.

- _I am looking to find a designer that can design with a style similar to as in this image._

Dear Joshua,

What you are showing here is the work of [Matteo Bologna](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052938/http:/www.muccadesign.com/), done for the [Balthazar Restaurant](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052938/http:/www.balthazarny.com/) in New York City.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052938im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Matteo_Bologna_6001.jpg)
  
 [Will Staehle](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052938/http:/thebazaarium.bigcartel.com/category/the-dollar-dreadful-family-library) is also _very good_ at Victorian-inspired typography.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052938im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Will_Staehle_5680.jpg)
